column1: * 1938 - Voice actor Michael Graham Cox is born.
* 1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien reads over The New Shadow and most likely starts typing a final typescript.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (video game) video game is released in Japan.
** The Fellowship of the Ring reach Eregion. Crebain appear and a shadow passes above them at night.Category:Datesde:8. Januarfi:8. tammikuuta
